text:
## How to find courses I’m interested in and join courses?

Andy is a member of an organisation. The organisation provides a series of
self-enrolment courses. Andy would like to explore the courses and enrol
himself in the courses that he is interested in. Let’s see how Andy will enrol
himself in a course.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks **Discover** on the left navigation pane.

2\. He finds a course that he is interested in and clicks the course card.

3\. On the **Course details** page, Andy can view the course information and
classes in the course.

4\. He selects one class and clicks **Join class**.

***Note** : If the course is a self-paced course without classes, Andy can
click **Join course** in the upper-right corner of the page.

5\. After joining the course, Andy clicks **Start learning**.

***Note** : If Andy wants to leave the course that he has joined before, he
can click **Leave class** or **Leave course**.
